snippet: One person has died and many more were sickened after receiving infusions of a saline solution produced by Wallcur, a San Diego-based company, the Food and Drug Administration said Wednesday.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration says one person died and many others were sickened after infusions of non-sterile saline solution made by San Diego-based company Wallcur; cases have been reported in seven states.
lead_paragraph: One person has died and many more were sickened after receiving infusions of a saline solution produced by Wallcur, a San Diego-based company, the Food and Drug Administration said Wednesday.

headline.main: One Person Dies and Many Others Fall Ill After Saline Infusions
headline.print_headline: Person Is Dead and Many Others Are Ill After Injections of a Saline Solution
